original_title: Indian Ocean Region’s stability requires early end to Gaza war - President Ranil
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe says the Indian Ocean Region’s stability requires an early end to the Gaza war followed by the establishment within 5 years of an Independent Palestine State and a guarantee for the security of the state of Israel.
He made this remark while delivering the keynote address at the 7th Indian Ocean Conference in Perth, Australia on Friday (Feb.09).
